job.title: Junior Data Scientist
job.description: strongSiteZeus strongis hiring a strongData Scientiststrong to join our growing product team Our ideal candidate has a strong background in Data Science and StatisticsbrbrSiteZeus is a location intelligence SaaS platform based out of Tampa FL and founded in 2013 We are a remote organization focused on company culture industry changing technology and employee value Our customers use SiteZeus to make better decisions about where to build their next physical locations and how to optimize their investment in existing locations We empower brands to pick the very best locations by employing the very best people and giving them the tools to succeedbrbrstrongExpected Salary Rangestrong  50000  85000brbrSiteZeus may consider candidates it deems as overqualified or underqualified Such candidates may be considered at salary numbers higher or lower than the listed rangebrbrstronguResponsibilities And DutiesbrustrongulliImplement statistical methods for predictive of continual process improvementbrbrliulstronguQualifications And SkillsbrustrongulliExperience with common data science and numerical libraries in Python ie NumPy SciPy SciKitLearnliliMust understand different statistical methodologies and good applied statistics skills such as distributions statistical testing regression etcliliUnderstanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms such as kNN Naive Bayes SVM Decision Forests etcliliProficiency in using query languages such as SQL is a plusliliProficiency with predictive analytics on big data projects is a plusliliExperience building
